pr_title: Remove collectDependencies call in favor of resolveDependencies

timeline.bodyText: This was unnecessary, because resolveDependencies (line 191) is essentially a combination of {@link #collectDependencies(RepositorySystemSession, CollectRequest)} and {@link #resolveArtifacts(RepositorySystemSession, Collection)}. as per the Javadoc.
timeline.author: suztomo
